name: Death Waits For No Man
description:
Dan Bitterman's time has come. Let's make his death awesome by killing him with that sign he so loves. Missed that opportunity? Well we'll just rewind time and retry. 

Take control of #84, a junior Grim and carry out his deathly duties. Do your job good enough and it might make it to tomorrow's front page.

Tutorial mode only at the moment. Will be adding more missions soon.

Controls

  1. WSAD to move about + shift to run.
  2. Click to grab an item and stop time, right click to put it back. 
  3. Q to reverse time
  4. F10 for menu

Mouse sensitivity can be changed via the F10 / main menu options.

A submission for Weekly Game Jam #42 themed: Time Travel.

A collaboration with Matt Patrick Walsh and Sarah Brewis

Runs pretty smooth on the browser with little to no lag. Try the download if you're having performance issues.
